The leader, by way of effective targeted communications, ensures strategic alignment with staff, business constituents, key stakeholders, and leaders. The Executive Director, Cybersecurity is part of the Global Information Protection Leadership Team and reports to the Vice President Information Security and Global CISO (based at Amgen’s Headquarters in Thousand Oaks, California).
